ModMetaData.name: The Dead Man's Switch - HeavyAutomatroid
ModMetaData.author: AobaKuma
ModMetaData.description: Millennia earlier, as the threat of archotech war machines, pirates and awry bio-organic weapons arise. Nara Industries initiated a project of semi-automated war-machines, which aimed at creating a legion of war-machines with low technology and maintenance requirements to aid humans in all galaxy to the war against all those threats.
